name: Leonid A. Levin
content: Leonid Levin: Home Page To God obedient, O Muse, Demand no wreath, fear no abuse. Remain to praise and slander cool, And do not argue with a fool.    -A.Pushkin. Leonid Levin's home page Append cont.htm to this page's address bar for link to my contact info. Click for my old research overview , selected articles with pointers to some follow-ups, or C V. My expository articles for non-specialists related to my research: Holographic Proofs (for Encyclopedia of Math.) and Randomness and Nondeterminism (International Congress of Math., invited addresses, 1995). A simple explanation of Robinson's aperiodic tilings (or a local copy). My Theory of Computation lecture notes. My STOC 6/23/2021 talk on inversion problems. To try to win $$ 1,000,000 by solving a problem related to my work (one of the seven "Millennium Math Problems") click here. Some of my bio and explanations of what I am out of, can be found in this book: springer.com/978-0-387-98269-4. Click to get outraged by my opinions on all sorts of things, be it democracy or quantum computers , taxes or Goedel Theorem, or even cosmology. The best lesson life has taught me is that the idiots in many cases are right. -W. Churchill
